archimate:BusinessObject.name: Flight manual (FLM)
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: Almost one FM per H/C S/N --- For the H175 base line + few options, there are more than de 2000 illustrations (Inc. 50% mini coming from the 3D), 5-10% more illustrations for the specific. It took 1.5 years for 2 people to build the H175 flight manual. --- Today, there are no guidance/rules to harmonize the flight manuals between programs. (A mix between photos, schema, 3D and drawings). This diversity could lead to customer dissatisfactions and to quality issues.
